name: Sleep tight (itch) (Megabyte Media)
description:
Sleep tight is a short horror experience in the style of a home invasion . The game uses pixelated graphics and low poly objects to create a retro look. This game was made within a few hours for fun. Enjoy!

Story
You spend the weekend in your holiday home in Montana as usual when you watch the News about a local case of unsolved murders in a town nearby. Make sure the door is closed and rest well!

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - look
  • RMB - Zoom
  • Esc - Pause
  • E - Interact
